snippet: Hoping to create the next smash-hit app? If you’re starting from scratch, you’ll need a crash course in programming, and probably a healthy marketing budget, to get noticed.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to create the next smash-hit app? If you’re starting from scratch, you’ll need a crash course in programming, and probably a healthy marketing budget, to get noticed.

headline.main: What It Takes to Be an App Developer
